other_dictation_tools_send_your_audio_st: Other dictation tools send your audio straight to the cloud. Vocally can run entirely on your device — your words never leave your machine. Airplane mode, off the grid, wherever. It just works.
process_everything_locally_on_your_devic: Process everything locally on your device, bring your own API key, or connect to our cloud. Your voice data stays private.
simple_transparent_pricing_for_vocally_f: Simple, transparent pricing for Vocally. Free personal plan, $5/month or $50/year Pro plan, and custom enterprise solutions.

type_four_times_faster_with_a_voice_firs: Type four times faster with a voice-first keyboard.
vocally_uses_ai_to_clean_up_your_transcr: Vocally uses AI to clean up your transcripts. It removes filler words, hesitations, false starts, etc. Speak naturally, Vocally will handle the rest.
vocally_works_system_wide_across_macos_w: Vocally works system-wide across macOS, Windows, and Linux. Any text field, any application—your voice just works.
